answers.author: Lynn Yandell
answers.text:
We have and it has been very popular. Advice is to buy as many as you can! Our kindles have 42 holds right now.

author: Dwight McInvaill
text: We just bought 25 Kindles to loan to the public.  Has anyone on the list done this yet?  If so, any advice?
title: Loaning Kindles
